bonus.value: Increase damage dealt by frost weapons by 6%.

mind.name: Hauler
mind.desc: Back and forth, it shuttles between the mines and the track.

memory.name: Restart
memory.desc: Vehicles can attack if they receive a new command.

belief.name: Mind of Machine
belief.desc: A cyber modification without any free will, thus carrying out orders like a machine.

emotion.name: Bullseye
emotion.desc: The biggest edge in a modification is the precision attack unhindered by emotions or sensibility.
